verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> forth from your <S%H776>country,<s%> And from your <S%H4138>relatives<s%> And from your father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> To the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> you;

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, And <S%H1431>make<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1431>great;<s%> And so you shall be a <S%H1293>blessing;<s%>

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> those who <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, And the one who <S%H7043>curses<s%> you I will <S%H779>curse.<s%> And in you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>"

So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> forth as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> with him. Now <S%H87>Abram<s%> was seventy-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> his <S%H1121>nephew,<s%> <S%H251><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7399>possessions<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H7408>accumulated,<s%> and the <S%H5315>persons<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H6213>acquired<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> and they <S%H3318>set<s%> <S%H1980><s%> out for the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> thus they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H4725>site<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> to the <S%H436>oak<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh.<s%> Now the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> [was] <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "To your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>" So he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who had <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to him.

Then he <S%H6275>proceeded<s%> from <S%H8033>there<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> with <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai<s%> on the <S%H6924>east;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> on, <S%H1980>continuing<s%> <S%H5265><s%> toward the <S%H5045>Negev.<s%>

Now there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> so <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> he <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H2009>"See<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%>

and it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you, that they will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> is his <S%H802>wife<s%>'; and they will <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, but they will let you <S%H2421>live.<s%>

<S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> that you are my <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H4616>so<s%> that it may <S%H3190>go<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with me <S%H5668>because<s%> of you, and that I may <S%H2421>live<s%> on <S%H1558>account<s%> of you."

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H8269>officials<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her and <S%H1984>praised<s%> her to Pharaoh; and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into Pharaoh's <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H3190>treated<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> for her <S%H5668>sake;<s%> and <S%H1961>gave<s%> him <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> and <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servants<s%> and <S%H860>female<s%> <S%H860>donkeys<s%> and <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5060>struck<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5061>plagues<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> Abram's <S%H802>wife.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to me? <S%H4100>Why<s%> did you not <S%H5046>tell<s%> me that she was your <S%H802>wife<s%>?

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> did you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'She is my <S%H269>sister,<s%>' so that I <S%H3947>took<s%> her for my <S%H802>wife<s%>? <S%H6258>Now<s%> then, <S%H2009>here<s%> is your <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her and <S%H1980>go.<s%>"

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> [his] <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> him; and they <S%H7971>escorted<s%> him <S%H7971>away,<s%> with his <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that belonged to him.
